FAQ / Wave 6 / Battle Cards /

Squid Pro Quo

  1. Post WotC: Allied Crossplay
    Squid Pro Quo     [Source: World|Strike FAQ]
    For the Decepticon chosen for Squid Pro Quo, the bonus attack can stack due to counters placed on that Decepticon from other cards that turn.
